characters.name: Yatora Yaguchi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 173 cm (5'8")

He is a second-year high school student with remarkably high grades despite his delinquent lifestyle. Yatora feels like his life is dull and predictable, that is, until he comes across his senpai, Maru Mori, painting in the school's art club. He discovers his passion for painting and dedicates his remaining school years to it, aiming to pass the Tokyo University of the Arts entrance exam.

Although Yatora is very hardworking and looks composed, there is an underlying insecure part of him that is further exposed when he starts making art. He has an extroverted nature and can easily understand what others are looking for in a relationship, further adapting himself in order to please everyone around him. For that reason, he tends to oppress his own feelings and wishes. Yatora relies a lot on his studied social skills whenever he is under a stressful or unfamiliar situation, but when he is caught by surprise or can't keep up his composed act he has an emotional outburst, often resulting in him crying and speaking more honestly. Yatora is especially hard on himself, putting high standards on himself while constantly undervaluing his own work and comparing himself to others, which ends up overwhelming him. Whilst comparing himself with others, he has great respect and admires the art that others around him create.

characters.name: Ryuuji Ayukawa
characters.description:
__Height:__ 5'9 (175cm)

[Official Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ryuji_ayukawa/)

Yatora's classmate and fellow art club member, they are responsible for inviting Yatora to the art club. Yuka has a talent for modern street fashion.

They are closest to their grandmother, who is the reason why they decided to pursue Japanese Art. Yuka will often put on a bright demeanor in front of themselves, and when placed in stressful situations they are often brash and impulsive. Yuka's mother and father both disapprove of their identity and lifestyle. It's shown that they don't have a very happy home life, and can only find solace in the company of their Grandmother, who is accepting of them and their aspirations. It is implied that they often go out at night to get away from home, and that their parents suspect them of trading dates with men for money.

Prefers to be called "Yuka", as they choose not to go by the name "Ayu" since their idol is singer Ayumi Hamasaki. Yuka is known to often crossdress and test gendered standards of clothing. ~!In chapter 20, Yuka tells Yatora about their bisexuality, explaining how they fell in love with a female middle school friend, but also feels an appeal towards men as well.!~

characters.name: Maru Mori
characters.description: An upperclassman from the art club. Her painting of angels opened Yatora’s eyes to the world of art and inspired him to make art himself.

characters.name: Yotasuke Takahashi
characters.description:
He has a reserved and shy personality but is shown to be standoffish and easy to anger. He’s blunt, and often says things as they are in his mind without stopping to explain to others what he means. He has complete confidence in his art skills.

He goes to the same cram school as Yatora and provokes Yatora with his genius art skill and antisocial personality.
~!Takahashi gets accepted into Tokyo University of the Arts (Geidai).!~

characters.name: Maki Kuwana
characters.description:
Goes to the same cram school as Yatora.

Under a lot of pressure to do well, as her whole family attended the prestigious Tokyo University of the Arts (Geidai), including her older sister who was the top scorer the year she applied.

Cheerful and friendly, but sometimes makes dark remarks. Is a big eater, and claims that it's common for people into art because drawing burns a lot of energy.

characters.name: Masako Saeki
characters.description:
Art club teacher.

Gives the right amount of criticisms to students that are motivated, while keeping things fun for those that aren't.

characters.name: Haruka Hashida
characters.description:
A second year high school student and attends the same school as Yotasuke. Also goes to the same cram school as Yatora.

Hashida applied to Geidai not because he wanted to actually get in but because he enjoys looking at other people's art. He often goes to art exhibitions and displays because he loves seeing people's art a lot (it's like a fetish). Has three sisters, two being older and one being younger.

characters.name: Shirota
characters.description: High school freshman. A member of the art club like Yuka and Mori-senpai. She is characterized by her long fluffy hair. She likes making clothes, and even in the art club's annual "summer vacation assignment", she makes unique costumes.

characters.name: Mayu Ooba
characters.description:
Ooba is an instructor at the prep school that Yatora attended.

She is a highly eccentric, carefree, and wise teacher who cares deeply for her students and her craft. She tends to be blunt and loud, and often tells her students about random animal trivia, more so during stressful times.

characters.name: Kinemi Miki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 173 cm (5'8")

An oil painter who is so kind and optimistic that she's described to be as bright as the sun. Met Ayano in prep school and the two have been extremely close ever since.
~! Kinemi broke Yatora's mirror during the Tokyo University of the Arts (Geidai) entrance exam. She was accepted into Geidai and attends the same class as Yatora. She worked as the caption of the Mikoshi team at the cultural festival as a first year.!~

characters.name: Maria Hanakage
characters.description: One of art teacher in Tokyo's National University of Fine Arts and Music, Geidai. Despite of being teacher, she is an easy-going person and always talk casually to her students.

characters.name: Yakumo Murai
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Geidai, Tokyo University of The Arts
__Art Specialty:__ Oil painting

Yakumo Murai attends Geidai University with Yatora Yaguchi. Yakumo is an extroverted person who comes off as arrogant and loud. He frequently feigns having his feelings hurt when others annoy him, regardless if it was intentional or not. This behavior of his in turn annoys other people that interact with him, such as Yatora. He has a penchant for big things and for creating big pieces of artwork, as he believes that "huge things are the strongest".

characters.name: Amo Nekoyashiki
characters.description: A popular artist who is most known for her 'Wrapping' art series. She is the only female oil painting professor at Tokyo University of the Arts (Geidai) and despite her cheery demeanor she's regarded as the most brutal of the first year instructors during critiques. She gives art everything she has and has no respect for those who don't fight with all of their might.

characters.name: Momoyo Kakinokizaka
characters.description: A first year student at Geidai in the oil painting program.

characters.name: Ayano Aizawa
characters.description:
A student at Tokyo University of the Arts (Geidai) in the oil painting program. She met Kinemi in prep school and the two have been extremely close ever since.
~!Is in the same oil painting class as Yatora. Despite that,  Ayano openly declares her hatred for painting and excels in 3D installations instead.!~

characters.name: Yumesaki
characters.description: An assistant from the technique and material department at Geidai.

characters.name: Koigakubo
characters.description: He is one of Yatora Yaguchi's friends. He has short, slicked-back hair and thin eyes. Likes baking sweets.

characters.name: Utashima
characters.description:
__Height:__ 178 cm

He is one of Yatora Yaguchi's friends.

characters.name: Sumida
characters.description:
__Height:__ 166 cm

He is one of Yatora Yaguchi's friends.

characters.name: Shirai
characters.description: A second-year high school student and a member of the art club. She likes BL, and is working on a doujinshi to participate in Comiket.

characters.name: Yamamoto
characters.description: A third-year high school student and a member of the art club. She is close with her juniors and is making a doujinshi with Shirai and the others.

characters.name: Umino
characters.description: A second-year high school student and a member of the art club. Likes to draw bishoujo characters. Knows a lot of funny manga.

characters.name: Inukai
characters.description: Geidai professor and vice-principal. In charge of the 2nd year Oil Painting majors.
